issue.title: [C++] Check and update vendored libraries
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4017](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4017). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some vendored libraries, like `util::variant`, seem old. Also, perhaps we should put them all in a `vendored/` directory, to make inspection easier?

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4017?focusedCommentId=16720556) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Having an `arrow/vendor` directory seems fine to me. 

There haven't been too many commits to mapbox/variant since last I looked, but I might have missed some. 

https://github.com/mapbox/variant/commits/master
